name: L'Cestrue Seyuntres
summary: In L'Cestrue Seyuntres, follow the story of Leonard and his fellow companions as they fight to save the world of Festiya from succumbing to darkness!

name: LCD Dem
summary: LCD Dem (Lucid Dream with some letters removed) is a Yume Nikki fangame by Japanese composer Koronba (Myspace and Bandcamp), who also was a contributor to the collaborative Nikki fangame project Yume 2kki under the name n3. The game is known for its sublime electronic music done in REAPER and atmospheres in Inkscape, centering around protagonist Chie, a young girl who, through exploring the realm of her dreams, must find and collect hidden orbs and effects, which give her special abilities.

name: LCD Sports: American Football
summary: A classic handheld American Football sports game to be played as single player or local two player. Run, Pass, Kick, and Punt against 3 levels of difficulty. Try your skill against the tricky AI or challenge a friend to compete locally.

name: LCD Dream Escalator
summary: A trip through a door leads to Large Sums of Money.
